name: Heartstriker
description:
Heartstriker is a legendary weapon. The King has returned to his hometown, after almost a century of ruling the kingdom and maintaining peace. He wants to find the next wielder of the Heartstriker.

Help the villagers and prove your worth to the King. The weapon could be yours!

Heartstriker, it's my first big project. My goal was to learn Unity and basic stuff like: scripts, post-processing, AI, UI, etc.

Music made by Vindsvept: https://www.youtube.com/user/Vindsvept
